feat: Add Kindle PDF highlights import support

Implemented complete PDF parsing functionality for Amazon Kindle PDF exports:

- Created pdfParser.ts with intelligent text extraction and parsing
- Supports both highlight-only and highlight+note formats
- Automatic cleanup of PDF page numbers and metadata
- Correctly separates highlights from notes based on spacing
- Extracts book title and author from PDF metadata

Updated Settings.tsx:
- Added PDF file upload support \(.pdf extension\)
- Integrated parsePDFKindleHighlights for PDF processing
- Updated UI to show both .txt and .pdf options
- Added instructions for PDF export method

Updated StoreContext.tsx:
- Modified importData to accept both string \(TXT\) and object \(PDF\) inputs
- Unified import flow for both file types

Tested with 84 highlights - all imported correctly with proper note separation.
